nchack.NCData.select_season¶

NCData.select_season(self, season, cores=1)¶

Select season from tracker

Parameters

  • season (str) -- Season to select. TBC.....

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the season selected

Return type

nchack.NCData
